replies.bodyText:
Can we avoid this

Unfortunately no. Caches should be in the working directory. So the layout is
working_dir
  |--maven_cache
  |--chocolatey cache
  `--repository_root

Another option is
working_dir (same as repository_root)
  |--maven_cache
  |--chocolatey_cache
  |--.ci
  |--config
  |--src
  `--so on

It will be more safe to separate all directories .
